edu.uga.cs.fluxbuster.classification

Class Classifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.uga.cs.fluxbuster.classification.Classifier

  • public class Classifier
extends java.lang.Object
    This class runs the classifier on the clusters and stores the derived classes in the database.
    Author:
    Chris Neasbitt

      • updateClusterClasses

        public void updateClusterClasses(java.util.Date logDate,
                        int minCardinality)
                          throws java.io.IOException
        Prepares the features from the db, executes the classifier, and stores the results in the database.
        Parameters:
        logDate - the clustering run date
        minCardinality - the minimum network cardinality of clusters to classify
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is an error creating the features file

      • classifyClusters

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.Integer>> classifyClusters(java.util.Date logDate,
                                                                                 int minCardinality)
                                                                                   throws java.io.IOException
        Prepares the features from the db and executes the classifier.
        Parameters:
        logDate - the run date of the clusters
        minCardinality - the minimum network cardinality for a cluster to be consider for classification
        Returns:
        a map of the classified clusters, the keys are the classes and the values are lists of cluster id's belonging to those classes
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
